item.description:
My apologies to those who signed up for this event on Saturday at the Allston Diner. When I saw that so many had signed up I realized that there was no way we were going to be able to get seats in such a small place, and in my experience the food is just OK.

From looking at the site of the Brookline Family Restaurant http://brooklinefamilyrestaurant.com/ they appear to be spacious enough to handle a larger group. The menu is simple and priced right as well.

Twisted Touring as it is now called will turn 7 this fall with a core group of riders and many more who I hope will join us out on the tarcake this year.

After Breakfast (Weather willing) we will ride south and west around Dover to Marlborough area. Looking forward to seeing everyone.

Paul
item.name: Annual Season Opener Breakfast
